name: The Madvent Calendar
summary: Looking for shelter from the harsh Winter weather, you approach the abandoned cabin out in the woods. As you reach for the doorknob, a gust of icy wind throws the door open, pushing you in. The fireplace lights ablaze and you close the door behind you. In the center of the room, you see it...that festive amalgam of 24 doors: The Madvent Calendar. Each door will lead you to a different strange world of horror and delight, but may only be opened if that day has arrived!
